content.detailedDescription:
To whom it may concern:

	i saw a strange object in the southern sky on sunday 5/10/09 at approximately 7:30 pm.  the flight was not consistent with any aircraft i'm familiar with.  it was slow and methodical, and in the distance.  it appeared to be 2000-4000 feet in altitude, approximately as large as a 2 story house, and appeared to change shape either by rotating or turning over somehow.  i also caught about 4 minutes of video tape; of which about 10-15 seconds are pretty compelling that what i saw is simply unexplained.  here is a brief description of the events:

	at about 7:30 pm on 5/10/09 i had just finished cleaning up from a massive mother's day feast that i had prepared.  i stepped outside on my back porch for some fresh air, when i noticed a very small object in the sky.  i first thought it was a high flying plane at 50,000 feet which sometimes fly overhead.  then i realized that it was overcast, and that i couldn't possibly see that high.  after reasoning about the cloud cover i thought the object to be around 2000-3000 feet high.  since then i have learned that the cloud cover was at 7000-8000 that night, so the object was definitely under that ceiling.  my initial thoughts of 2000-3000 feet may be correct, but not for certain.    

	right after i realized that is was moving too slow for a normal aircraft at that altitude so i called for my girlfriend to come and take a look.  she thought it was odd as well, and i asked her to rush to get the video recorder.  we started shooting the object, and was initially very hard to get into focus as our zoom was at 35 xs and was in auto focus mode.  so if we moved just slightly, or caught the top of a tree, or had a bird fly right by it would keep auto focusing and then blur out the object.  

	once we fiddled through it for a minute or two, we got the hang of it, and were able to capture several distinctly different shapes not visible with the naked eye.  one was a diamond, one looked like a slightly elongated football, and one like a top with some sort of antennae protruding from the top half of the shape.  there was only one object, but was either turning or rotating to create these different shapes.  the video we have is shaky, showing the object to dart around, but in reality it was moving in a straight line, and our zoom at 35 xs and our shaky hand is the cause for the appeared erratic motion of flight.  

	the flight of the object was in the southern sky headed due north.  as it came north, it seemed to drop in altitude.  then it went 45 degrees ne, and then headed due east.  as it headed east it appeared to ascend. at various times it appeared to have some sort of halo or ring around the entire object; either from air displacement or something else.  it made no noise, and there were other aircraft in the sky that were farther away and closer that were making noise.  the whole event from start to finish lasted roughly 7-10 minutes, and we have roughly 4-5 minutes of video.  there are about 15 seconds of very compelling shots of an object that i've never seen before.  

	i'm about as well versed in military aviation as a private citizen can be, as i'm fascinated with the military channel, the discovery channel, and the history channel.  this was not a b2, a f117, f22, or an f35.  i have seen all of them on numerous shows, and i can't see how any of the shapes i saw on the video could be one of those aircraft. 


	lastly, after my story aired on some local news stations here in town, a gentleman contacted me via fax with some sketches he drew after a sighting with him and his girlfriend on june 20th 2007 at approximately at 7:50 pm.  when i saw the fax it was clear that the images were very similar though he didn���t have a video or a picture.  i contacted him and he came to my office to hear my story.  when he showed up, we talked for a bit.  he seamed genuine in nature, and as he was telling me his story, i quickly realized the similarities to my event.  the object seemed to change shape on an axis, there were at times a blur or a ring around the object obscuring the air around the object, that it moved slowly and deliberately across the sky changing altitude, and that it matched no aircraft he had ever seen either in shape or flight characteristics.  he explained that when he called his girlfriend into the room to see the story on tv she immediately said, ���that���s it������  although he saw most of the object with the naked eye, it was closer to him than for me, as i wouldn���t have been able to decipher the shapes with my naked eye.  only with the use of my camera with the zoom all the way at 35 xs was i able to clearly see the shape of the object.  in telling me his story, i could see he felt vindicated of sorts, and was very interested in seeing where this went.  he said with almost 99% certainty that we saw the same object...

	i can send a still picture, and i'm truly writing to see if we can get any type of explanation of what we saw, or if you could shed some light into where we could go for help.  

thanks for your time,
content.summary: Strange diamond and then a football shaped object in the southern sky.

content.detailedDescription: Well we were walking about to meet up with some people when i spotted a bright yellow orange light with no apparant shape that just looked like a flying ball of light silently hovering toward the mountain, we watched it flying when all of the sudden these three objects flying in formation (that at first i thought were three fighter jets) appeared out of nowhere and were speeding faster than the other object,  going in a different dierction but was within the radius of the other object, it started intertwining in some kind of crazy formation then the three objects dissapered leaving the yellow object alone it started flying towards the mountain and looked like it just hovered for a few seconds then either went behind the mountain out of sight or just suddenly died out. it was like nothing i have ever seen as i was watching and after we seen the object i was just cussing out of excitment and shock. the sighting lasted less than five minutes
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Fireball,  Star-like,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Illuminating light flies across sky while missile fighter jet looking objects intertwine and dissapear.

content.detailedDescription: Left ex-wifes fathers home in clinton and was heading home on river road south. noticed chromelike sphere settling above car as we drove. almost seems attached. also reflected any light that might have hit it like my instrument panel. wife at time was pregnant. she was able to lean forward to see object better than i. as we traveled on and came to a gully, it stayed with us until we started uphill and it banked left and slowly traveled away and above the field. there was no noise. no time lost. did not see anything else that night pertaining to what we saw. never felt threatened.
content.summary: Small sphere smaller than my 1884 mercury marquis and completely chrome.

content.detailedDescription:
At around 4:30pm today may 12th 2009. i have seen many "ufo" in my time but today this was a mysterious one. looked just 4 balls clustered, but morphing in place as it was traveling. 

my friend and i just got a drink at starbucks in lacey, wa. after getting our drink, we got back into the truck and went to the corner of lilly rd and pacific st, when my buddy that was driving said "what the heck is that" (by the way this is what i always here from people that have never seen them). it looked like balloons at first. then unlike balloons having a string and  the mass of balloons going upward right away. it seemed to follow our path for about 1 mile mile 1 1/2.

the object was about 500 feet away (from the road we were on) and about 200-300 feet high when we first seen it at that corner. it was at about the same altitude for about 1 mile traveling down pacific ave,  then it started ascending at a rapid 
rate upward until in vanished into clouds.

i didn't have a camera or cellphone that takes pictures otherwise i could had some solid evidence. i bet you the camera on lilly and pacific ave street lights would show what we first has witnessed on that corner.

on top of this "sighting" helicopter have been going off at more of a rate than usual here in lacey/olympia wa. today. i woke up to helicopter this morning and all day through out the day and have heard them and seen them passing all night tonight.

my personal feeling on this is, that this was military or this was a drone of some kind. who knows i have seen all kinds of craft off and on for years but today this one was strange one.
content.summary: Black balloon clusters over lacey, wa.

content.detailedDescription:
It was approx 8pm monday evening, noticed a bright light in the sky, at first i thought it was a plane, as we have plenty of air traffic, but i noticed the light was very bright and it seemed close.  as it passed, i thought i would hear a sound but nothing, i also noticed that the light never changed, it stayed constant even though i saw the object coming towards my direction, passing overhead and then moving off away from me.  it pretty much followed a straight line, as it was moving off, we had some cloud cover and it seemed to pass through a cloud.

i've never seen a plane with a constant light unless it was heading towards or away from me.  i usually see with planes a bright light as it heads towards then generally you will see some type of blinking as it passes overhead.

it was strange, but i can't say it was a ufo, only that it was odd the way it passed.  based on how bright the light was i thought it was closer to the ground than most planes fly and i was confused because it made no sound and didn't seem to travel all that fast.
content.summary: A bright light crossing the sky slowly, no deviation in the light whatsoever, no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
Wind calm, quiet night, clear and cool, low 50s.  no bugs or frogs making any noises in the woods, which is unusual. rural area, surrounded by mostly woods and farmland near the top of 1280 elevation in murrysville, westmoreland county, pa.

my fiancee and i were watching tv in living room, when amber/orange, size of a big pea at arms length, kinda round , "light" caught our eyes in patio window on left of tv.  as we ran out patio door onto deck, (grabbing the camcorder and waiting for the dang thing to boot up) we could see was headed ene in silent, constant speed, no flashing lights.  in fact, the light it was emitting was constant, glowing--not super bright, not exactly round, blurry like.  i noticed that it did not move in a straight line, more of a slight snake-like wiggle as it moved.  as it continued on it's path, it dropped down behind the trees at edge of the yard--fiancee said he thought he saw a smaller one with it (behind the trees by now and falling) said, "it's gonna crash, it looks like", as he supposed it would come in contact with the ground at that point, but i think perhaps it was an illusion caused by the arc-like trajectory.  tried to video it, but even on 'nightshot' the cheap sony camcorder only has a black screen--so all you'll get from it is me saying what a piece of sh#& it is.  called john ventre about 9:30, he saw a moving high altitude light moving in a similar wiggling motion from his location. 

i'm wondering if it's the same kind (orange or amber) that's been seen in england, holland and other places lately. like this video:
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=cjaubt6ljsm&feature=channel_page

a lot of those are diamond shaped when seen up close.  i couldn't see a shape, though.
content.summary: Pa-amber/orange glowing light, size of large pea at arms length, no tail/trail.

content.detailedDescription:
Alright /x/ it is 9:26 as i am re-typing this. at 9:15 pm est i took my dog outside, i live in adams county pa and i looked up and saw this bright [cms/tg/pd] light, and i thought nothing of it. i hear a few cars go by, and some crickets. no big its a nice night. =p so i keep looking at this bright light and its moving really fast. so i stare at it neglecting my dog and i see this streak of light come off of it, then im like "alright what am i looking at?" so the thing that came off of it disappeared, and i continued looking at the fast moving light. and im like "no this has to be a plane, and the setting sun is reflecting light off of it". ya know? trying to be rational =p. and as it passes over head, i listen close and i hear no sound at all. then i see something else in the sky (the sun is still making a small amount of light on the horizon) and i quickly realize "oh its just a plane."...."oh its a plane!!" because there was no light "reflecting" off of it. so i look back at this bright [cms/tg/pd] light and its been about 30 seconds since it had passed over head and seemed to be quite a distance away from where i was standing. and still i head no sound other than the plane that had also just passed over.(( the distance and angle between the two objects allowed me to discern which sound would have come from which object. its kind of hard to explain due to "no pictures".)) but taking into consideration that planes usually fly about 40000ft, the object i was looking at was well over 60000. i came to this conclusion because i compared their overall size to the size of the stars as they passed. its a rough guess, but its as good as i could do. i was going to go listen to the police scanner, to hear if there were any eye witnesses, but the antenna was broken. ;_;. 

i posted this on 4chan. i wrote it to get a few laughs, then someone told me about this site. ill add to it now.  

the object was flying in a straight line and flew too far away, so i could no longer see it. my feelings were, that of belief. =p

i would have taken pictures, but i didnt want to miss a second.
content.summary: Ball of light, i thought was plane until an actual plane flew over at same time.Clear difference. too high to be helicopter

content.detailedDescription: The ufo appeared to be between 1500 and 5000 feet in the air.  it was round with a black main body with one white light at one point of the disk and another of the same color at the opposite side.  the object was moving quietly from southeast to northwest and the lights were moving around the object in a counter-clockwise direction as observed from below.
content.summary: Black, round, with two visible lights on opposite ends of the solid round object.

content.detailedDescription: I have web page http://ufonow.Tripod.Com for more detailed info. chris
content.summary: I have been in contact with craft for months with hours of video.

content.detailedDescription:
Went out in the front of our house to see the space station fly over and felt the need to look up and saw 2 spheres about 2 minutes after the space station went past about same speed and coarse  even my wife saw them and she saw the same thing when the russian and us space stations went over, but thy came down in the hills in back of our house and she stated that they accelerated like something from stare trek 

my feeling well i live in las vegas i see them all the time i get a feeling to look up and there thy are 
don't remember the date but i looked up and saw 2 jets large and small chase jet saw 2 white contrails and one yellow the yellow stopped shaped like sphere and the chase jet flue around it then flue back to the other jet the sphere doped like a rock vary fast, next day same thing but one big jet , i was on the free way.
content.summary: I saw 2 spherical objects behind the space station.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside in my backyard at appoximately 10:50pm having a cigarette, when i looked up at the stars like i always do, it was a clear night so many stars were out. i was noticing the little dipper just above my house. i looked down to give my neck a break and was thinking just how far away the little dipper was in miles from where i was standing. i am not sure why i was thinking about that at the time, i guess my mind was just wandering. then i looked up again, and to the eastern sky i noticed this super bright white light, at first i thought "wow that is the brightest star i have even seen". it appeared to be far away like in outer space, like the stars.
i live near a airport, and i knew that it was not an airplane or any other type of aircraft since there was no running lights (red or green) flashing.
i have seen many of airplanes at night, in fact far off in the distance in the northern direction, there were planes flying at the time i noticed this "unusual" bright light which was in an area where there were no planes flying. so i stared at this intense light for a good 30 seconds, then it dimmed to almost nothing, and then it started to move slowly in a southern direction. then it disappeared. at first i thought that maybe it was a exploding star or meteor, but based on what i saw, i came to the conclusion that this was something that was very different. then i started to think that i maybe what i just saw a ufo. i still do not understand what i saw, but i experienced something i will not forget.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Super bright white light, starlike, flashed like it had exploded then started moving slowly then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were sitting on the boca raton beach at 10:30 a.M. on tuesday may 12, 2009. the sky was clear blue with a few scattered cumulus clouds. suddenly my wife sat bolt upright staring at the sky and stated she had just seen a ufo. she said she was watching what she (at first)thought was an airplane emerging from a cloud flying horizontally from north to south at conventional aircraft speed. the object suddenly changed direction and speed travelling upward at an almost vertical angle at a velocity so fast that it was literally gone in one to two seconds. 
she described the object as bullet shaped and larger than the convential aircraft we periodically saw from the same position.

we have been florida residents for 30 years, and are accustomed to seeing all types of aircraft in the local skies including helicopters, blimps, hot air balloons, private general aviation airplanes, commercial jets and military aircraft including harrier jump jets and advanced stealth bombers and fighters at the annual military air shows. 

nothing in our experience comes even remotely close to the flight characteristics demonstrated by this object.
content.summary: sighted at 10:30 a.M. from beach. impossible speed and course change.

content.detailedDescription:
I live on the third floor of my apartment building. it has 4 windows facing the mountains to the south and west, and also the river behind main st.  i had just put my children to bed around 9:15pm, and went out side to sneak a smoke, when i heard what sounded like a very low rumble, maybe a jet ( not uncommon for jets to make a once over around here) i looked up and saw a small twinkling light moving very quickly (south across the sky directly over main st. but as i was watching it, the light would go out completely and (still flying in the same direction) would show up again about 5 seconds later. i thought that was weird but didn't think much of it. was probably a plane, though i had never seen one act like that before. i went back inside and put on a movie. about 10 minutes later, i heard the low rumble again, and noticed that the same twinkling light was coming back again from the east but this time it was very low, about 100ft? above tree line. the light did not blink out as it had before but moved in a very straight line from east to west and was going much much slower than before. it went out of sight so i sat back down to watch my movie. then i guess 3-4 minutes later i got up to used the bathroom and happened to look out the window. what i saw caught me off guard. i saw three very large lights like spotlights or headlights straight ahead of my window. they were lined up horizontally and just hovered. it looked, from my perspective, that they were right over a nunnery that overlooks the river. i thought for sure that twinkling light i had seen earlier was now headed on a collision course with my apartment! 
except the lights never got bigger as if it were getting closer. it just stayed in the same place for about 30 seconds or so. i don't know how long it was there to begin with but i felt like it knew i was watching it. very quickly the bright lights seemed to dim into much smaller ones with soft blue lights in between and a bright almost neon green aura around it( it maybe 1 craft or two and one just turned off it's lights.They were so bright i could not tell if the smaller one was there before.) it was circular with one large middle light that was white, and two smaller lights on either side of it that had a bluish tint then two more smaller white lights on the outer edge. the green aura looked like it just outlined the craft and was pulsating or glowing. the rest was black. it looked like the lights were rotating(i drew pictures hopefully i can upload by the end of the week) it moved at a snails pace toward the river to the west. i watched it for at least a full minute before it just seemed to disappear. i looked around for it because i know that planes can't do that, so it had to go somewhere. as i looked around i saw a single tiny red dot hovering at least 75ft over the river behind my apartment directly under the moon. it stayed there motionless so i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me but there was no reflections of anything red coming from inside my apartment. anyway i watched it for maybe 15-20 seconds then all of a sudden it went straight up in the air! slowly at first then faster. it stopped right dead center of the moon then came flying right over my apartment. these objects made no sound! it was early in the evening so the moon was still pretty low, it was also a very clear night no clouds in the sky at all.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Three bright lights just above the tree line and smaller object with lights and green halo.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,

 the photo was taken a couple of weeks ago from the breakfast area of the king's ransom hotel in sedona, az at 9:11am on 5/1/09.  i have to say that it was taken through a window(dark spots, most visible in the sky area, are dirt from window), but there were no lights on inside the room to cause a reflection that results in the bright "objects" seen in the sky area of the photo.
additional things to take note of when viewing this photo are:
 
-slight cloud cover that day/overcast
 
-taken with an iphone, which is only 2 mega pixels(but almost 200 additional pictures were taken with the same phone on this trip and none resulted in any light objects/artifacts that are seen in the sky on this photo) **also, one of the benefits of the phone is that it captures crucial meta data(i.E. date, time, location etc..) within the file, which can be viewed by right-clicking(on pc) properties/summary.
 
-also important to note that i did not see these objects with the naked eye at the time the photo was taken.  i was only when i looked at them a couple of days later that i noticed them.  obviously had i seen them, i would have more to share because i would keep clicking until i ran out of storage.
 
let me just say that i am still not sure what they are, and am a bit of a skeptic, but this definitely got me thinking and i would be interested to see other people's take on it.  if they are ufos, they seem to be in a similar formation/pattern as many of the other pictures taken in the arizona skies and all over the world.  this seems like a very good forum on this and would like to see if there was anyone else in the sedona area that day that witnessed, or have pictures, of this as well.

thanks
content.summary: Picture taken of mulitple objects in sky over sedona 5/1/09.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving a client home at 7:48pm tonight. (monday, may 11, 2009.)we were about to stop for a red light when i looked at my dashboard clock. it was 7:48pm.I was early getting this client home. i'm always checking out the skies whenever i stop the car. we had beautiful skies all day long and i took notice of it. at the time of this event, the sky had several flat, wispy clouds in the south western sky. as we stopped for the red light, i had a clear view of the sky and looked up. we were stoped at the traffic light at the corner of browncroft blvd and winton road, rochester, ny,  we both saw a plane in the distance taking off from the rochester airport, low in the sky, ascending upward and flying slightly south-easterly, turning more easterly and starting to climb to cruising altitude. i said to arlene, my passenger, "i wonder where they're going at 8 o'clock at night?"  i then felt the "need" (urge) to look above and to the right of that airplane, where i saw a large bright round ball of light come right out of the clouds very abruptly, heading north-easterly and moving fast. it was moving about one and half times faster then the airplane. it was heading to what looked like the same direction of the airplane, but a bit more south-easterly. (if the ball of light had continued in that direction, in a very short time it would have been parallel to the plane, but at a higher altitude. at first i thought it was another airplane coming in for a landing from the south, and that the setting sun was hitting it and lighting it up to look like a ball of light. it didn't act like a regular airplane though, so i held my hands up to it and closed both thumbs and both index fingers together to form a circle, and it was about that size and round, like a bright ball. i asked arlene if she could see it and she said no, because there was a tree across the street in her sight of vision. just as i asked her that question, the ball stopped dead and turned sharply at a right angle to its left, my right(westerly). i watched it head west for several seconds at a very high rate of speed, and then it just blinked out against a clear blue sky. it did not go into any clouds, as there were no clouds in that area of the sky, just blue and clear as it just blinked out.  it just disappeared. the traffic light changed and i drove forward about 2 blocks and pulled into a driveway on my right. i looked up, but could not see anything in the sky.  had it been another airplane it would still be in the clear sky and visible by then on a sideways angle without sunlight on it. it would have been visible in the shape of a regular airplane. i have witnessed airplanes do this many times over monroe county during a setting sun. (a bright light, which turns back into the shape of the airplane after the airplane turns to head to the airport.) i scanned the south-westerly sky all around the area of the first sighting and to the right and nothing was visible except the original plane, on my left, still heading easterly and climbing slightly. this whole event probably took one and a half minutes. by it's actions and speed, i feel this could have been a ufo. i sent a personal email and copy of this report to mr. james bouck, jr., new york state director of mufon and he asked that i send it to you, also.  you may contact me, however, i will be away may 15-22. end of report.
content.summary: Large, bright ball, appeared at high speed from sm. cloud, shot off and blinked out.

content.detailedDescription:
Object viewed on tv:
url removed to investigators field cms flg 08/07/2011 18:55 cst

wanted only to bring this to mufon's attn. i am not a witness. this happened in west-central, il. which, as i'm sure mufon knows, is a hotbed. (millstadt police officer's chase in 2000/etc, and other random sightings in this area.)
content.summary: - west-central illinois

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my hot tub gazing up into the night sky watching for the usual meteors and satellite.  i noticed a blurry white light  moving slowly and silently in a straight line from the west to the north-east towards the city klamath falls.  it appeared to be about 12 to 15 miles away from my viewing spot. i quickly got out of the hot tub and asked my wife to come outside to see it too.  i then ran for the binoculars and looked at the object.  it continued its slow northeasterly path and it remained a soft blurry white light.  i watched it until it faded out of site.  i did not see any green or red navigation lights or any strobe light.  it was too large to be a satellite, and i'm convinced it was not a jet or prop driven airplane, keeping in mind that it made no sound. it was a perfectly clear night sky, no clouds, haze or moisture in the air.  i am pretty convinced we spotted a ufo of some kind.
content.summary: Silent blurry white light

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving along u.S. 52 from portsmouth to my home in west portsmouth. i was excited about the weather because the stars were quite visible in the night sky. earlier in the night, i had considered doing some late-night observing, but i remembered the telescope at the local planetarium is currently being repaired / serviced.

i noticed the first flying object as i was leaving portsmouth, headed toward west portsmouth. the object caught my attention because of its large size, low altitude, flashing lights, and slow speed. there were several instances in which the craft stopped completely. the lights beneath the craft seemed to behave somewhat erratically. i slowed my car and watched from the side of the highway for several minutes.

the first craft (ufo1 in my drawings) appeared to stop over the sky several times and change the patterns of the lights underneath it. i saw ufo1 for the longest duration of time (probably 6 minutes) before it disappeared from view. around 4 minutes from the time of the initial sighting, i spotted the second craft (ufo2) which was exactly the same size and shape and exhibited the same lighting patterns beneath. ufo1 seemed to stop moving in the sky at least twice. however, ufo2 only seemed to stop once before redirecting and following ufo1. i aggressively followed ufo2, attempting to keep track of it and get a better look. unfortunately, it seemed to completely disappear after passing over a ridge. there was no detectable sound emitted from either craft.

i have included two maps, as well as an animated gif showing the light pattern.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two flying objects, flashing and traveling erraticaly before dissapearing.

content.detailedDescription:
I believe the year was 1990. it was summer, probably july. about 11pm. i had driven come from work to my parents house in lebanon, maine. i looked up at the sky to see if i could find the bigger dipper. while locating it, i saw what i thought was a shooting star. then another shooting star took off where the last one ended (the light would shoot across the entire sky and then disapear... it looked just like a shooting star... same size, light intensity, shape,speed, apparent distance to the eye, and color). 

however, it could not be a shooting star because the next one always took off where the last one ended. the pattern was erratic. sometimes it would take off at a 90 degree angle from the last flight path and other times 180 degrees. it zoomed across the entire skyline in a matter of 1 to 2 seconds... amazingly fast... too fast for anything man made and making direction turn that would be impossible at such speeds. after about a dozen or so of these lights across the sky, it took off past the tree line and did not reappear. i stood there stunned for about a half an hour before giving up on seeing it again. 

my mother's friend, a 70+ year old lady told her about seeing it that same night (i never told my mom ... or anyone... until my mom mentioned this lady telling her... i thought people would think i was crazy). 

i have never seen anything like that in my whole life (i was 17 at the time and i am now 36). it was amazing and even with my scientific mind, i cannot explain what it is that i saw that night. i've tried to rationalize it many times and i just can't explain it... but i saw it and it was real.
content.summary: Shooting star looking object(s) darting across sky several times.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in my back yard at around 10pm i always look up in the sky looking for objects this time i saw one.
i notice  bright light coming up in the west over another house and i thought it was a plane or jet or helicopter spot light i watched it rise in the sky and fly over head it never lost its brightness no matter where it was in the sky 
it had no flashing lights and it didnt make a sound it flew in a sraight line i watch it until it disappeared over to the east
it looked like a big spot light in the sky but it radiated white light in all directions no matter where it was in the sky
i kept checking the sky to see if i could have mistaken it for a jet but i saw jets up in the sky they all had flashing marker lights and i could here them
i feel i saw something that could be a ufo im feeling excited and im going back to see if i can spot it again
content.summary: White oval star like light.

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside to smoke a cigarette.  i am always looking up in the sky.  as soon as i looked up i saw a bright orange object traveling across the sky.  as soon as i noticed it....I mean as soon as i ran back into the house to get a camera, it switched coarse.  but it switched coarse quite smoothly.  not abrupt or 90 degrees or anything.  more like 35 degrees.  it almost seemed to notice that i noticed it and it and it changed its coarse imediately and then disapeared behind some clouds that were above the bitteroot range.  i don't know enough about light vs. distance, and trying to equate speed accordingly.  but i spen a lot of time looking up at the sky and i have no clue what on earth this was that i saw.
content.summary: Steady, constant orange light, traveled fast, switched direction smoothly, no-sound.

content.detailedDescription: Me, my fianc���e and our two children were walking in a public park when she said to our oldest "look at the light" i looked up and saw a bright orangery red light flying at about 200 feet off the ground. it had something spinning end over end around it seemed separate from the light itself. it looked like a ball of fire trapped in a glass dome. it was at night so i couldn't see what was spinning around it but it looked like a disk of some sort. the object made no noise at all and to be as low as it was i thought i would at least hear something. the object flew in a straight path till it was out of our sight. i was almost scared but could not seem to take my eyes off of it, even to take a picture with my cell phone. it was way to low to be a plane and it was surely not a hot air balloon. there was nothing i could think of to come up with a reasonable explanation of the object. about 4 others aside from my party witnessed the event. all of them didn't know what it was. i never really considered myself to be a ufo believer but now i don't know.
content.summary: A round bright orange object with something spinning around it. flying at about 200 feet at 25 to 35 mph making no noise at all.

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i had just finished watching ufo hunters, ironically, and we decided to step outside to have a smoke. the sky was perfectly clear and you could see alot of stars. as we were talking, i noticed a bright yellow light coming at us from the northwest, it was flying to the southeast in a straight line, but it was wobbling in a calculated left to right shift in very short, calculated bursts. there was absolutely no sound, and this thing was moving fast. it was definitely not an airplane or anything like that. it had no flashing lights. it could have possibly been a satellite or the space station, but i don't think that is the case, because of the left and right short shuffle motions it was making. we watched it for about 3 minutes before it disappeared over the rooftops continuing on it's southeast path. i wanted to go in and get my nitemax camcorder and minidv recording unit, but i knew that by the time i got back in, it would have passed by because of it's speed. we opted to just watch it. we made note of the trees, and the stationary stars, and you could clearly see the wobbling motion it was making by looking at the stationary objects and viewing the object from our peripherals. we're not quite sure what it was, but it definitely wasn't an airplane or a balloon. and at one point in it's path, it's light intensity increased to a bright whitish blue. would like to know if anyone else witnessed it in the area.
content.summary: Yellow/white light heading northwest to southeast.

content.detailedDescription: Was on chanel 11 news at 6 or so..I seen two f15s fly over today and one other fighter jet.That were flying toward st.Louis.Duing the time of this ufo that was video taped.You need to check up on it......
content.summary: Ufo taped in st. louis today.

content.detailedDescription:
Murrysville, pa - 11:46 am.  i had slept in on that saturday morning because everyone was gone early.  i was drinking my coffee and strolled over to the living room patio door to check the weather outside since i could see the trees in the valley blowing pretty hard. i was thinking to myself, "this probably would be a great day to fly a kite".  just as i thought that, a glint of metallic or reflective something caught my eye up.  i couldn't believe it! i kept squinting & blinking my eyes hard to clear them.  i said, "what the..." it was a v-shaped object below the clouds, tumbling slowly.  i wondered it someone's kite or balloon got away, so i turned around to grab my binoculars off the bar to check it out. in the second or two it took me to grab the binoculars and spin around, it was gone!  i thought, "wow, that must have been another ufo!"  (we've seen quite a few different kinds here especially since last year) so, i grabbed my camera, looked, didn't see it, but decided to take a few pics anyway in case it reappeared.  it did, half minute later, but it was drastically farther away in that short period of time and to the left of where it was, judging by how much smaller it was.  the 'kite' would've had to go against the wind to go where it did.

the 1st pic is of where i first saw it with drawing added of what it looked like.
the 2nd and 3rd pictures are the actual pics of it with blowups enhanced.
the 4th pic i took after it went out of view but i look a pic anyway, and, after zooming in and looking around, found this little speck that might be it far away (can't upload it because only can do 3).

i wasn't going to post it because, a) the pics are not too clear, b) we've reported so many people might think we're 'kooks'... but my family thinks it's better than no pictures and that others might have seen the same thing.
content.summary: Pa-reflective daytime v-shape (chevron) 1/2 inch at arm's length, tumbled slowly.

content.detailedDescription:
I was late go to bed, i got out at my back door to smoke my last cigarette, and i look't in the sky to the west and  saw that flying star in very high altitude it diapered in a sec. up warts. it must be very fast.
that is not the first time, last year so end off august i saw a round 15 to 20 and even my children saw them
flying from any directions and then standing still for hours like stars i was very fascinated and excited to see that happens,my children had no explanation for that... i think we will see that soon often.
content.summary: Starlight very high altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
My backyard about 6:10 pm (est)

i wanted to mow the lawn so i moved my two cars.  i happened to look up (something told me to) and i saw the object.  i watched it hover (about 300-800) feet of the ground.  it stayed their for 15 seconds like that.  then it started moving northbound slowly. i looked away, and it was gone.  it gave me the creeps.  no one beleives me. it looked sort of like this...
content.summary: Long (no wings) cylinder like. metallic.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling with my wife on rt 378 south from bethlehem in to lower saucon, when we got to the top of 378 & mountain drive, we observed a very bright low flying fireball. it crossed 378s & mountain drive, flying above some houses, maybe about 200 ft off the ground. we continued down 378 and made a left on to seidersville rd. seidersville road runs parallel to mountain drive. we observed the fireball still flying over the housed to the left. it gained altitude and disappeared in to the sky by the time we got to hickory hill rd - bridge. it made no noise and was a red/orange pulsing color.
content.summary: Low flying fireball sited

content.detailedDescription: Me and 2 friends went outside to have a cigarette on my front porch, since i've seen dozens of ufo's in the last year we had our eyes glued to the sky like usual. it was very clear out no clouds at all. i noticed a flashing yellow light near 2 stars so i laerted my friends, but when they went to look the flashing light was gone but about 20 seconds later it re appeared traveling in a different direction than before we all saw it for about 40 seconds and then it completely dissapeared. it was traveling to slow to be a plane plus it just completely dissapeared. i knew it was a ufo's because i've had several experiences with ufo's. we went back inside to watch some tv and returned back outside an hour later thats when we saw another ufo i've seen a few like this one before. it was a solid yellowish white star like orb but it was way to close to be a star and it was way to high to be any aircraft that i know about. it was traveling in one direction and kind of zig zagging and in a split second it started going in a completely different direction and went over top of my house. i wasn't really fazed by the sighting as its almost becoming a natural occurrence for me but it was one of my friends first time seeing one so we were pretty excited about that. i've thought about reporting all my other sightings but alot of it is to overwhelming. this is my first report and i plan on reporting any further sightings.
content.summary: Solid yellow/white like a star, moving way way faster than an airplane, changed directions several times, zig zagging.

content.detailedDescription:
My name is joshua . my case worker is ken pfeifer . my dads name is john i live on 254 upper neck r.D pittsgrove nj 08318 . . 10 :45 pm to the north west of my house . as me and my dad john walked up to the street , in front of my house we looked to the west . about 1/2 of a mile down my rode . was a orange ball . it was fire orange . like almost red as of your break lights on your car . it sat still to the north west . for about 15 minutes and 45 seconds at the least . then after that it moved slightly back words and forward . very slowly then moved to the south . then it started to twinkle like a diamond color . all over it . 

i have steiner german scope . pretty high powered . we looked at it with that .
content.summary: Fire orange to the northwest. stationary 100 feet off ground.
